FuncDef: This command configures the anti-spoof type of the SAP.

ParaDef.Info: Configures SAP anti-spoof filtering to use both the source IP address and the source MAC address in its lookup. The anti-spoof ip-mac command will fail if the default anti-spoof filter type of the SAP is ip-mac and the default is not overridden, or if the SAP does not support Ethernet encapsulation.
Indicates that the ingress anti-spoof is based on the source MAC address and egress anti-spoof is based on the nh-ip-address.
